snippet.title: District 2 Bar & Grille
snippet.description:
* 4.
District 2 Bar & Grille
8.3
3238 Wisconsin Ave NW (at Macomb St NW)
American • $ $ $ $ • View Menu •
* Donald M. • April 20, 2011Great neighborhood pub. Nice selection of beers and the food keeps getting better. Great place to watch a game, too. Except for the fact that he's a Ravens fan, Matt behind the bar is terrific.
People talk about: grille has partnered, matt and chris, cheese with steak
Save

snippet.title: Public Bar Dupont
snippet.description:
* 5.
Public Bar Dupont
8.3
1214 18th St NW
Sports Bar • $ $ $ $ • View Menu •
* Doug E. • September 6, 2013Thought maybe I could come here and get a few beers and food for the Ravens' opening game. Not possible due to no service. Twenty five minutes and counting with no waitress.
People talk about: rooftop deck, redskins, tabbedout

snippet.title: Lou's City Bar
snippet.description:
* 6.
Lou's City Bar
7.5
1400 Irving St NW (btwn 14th & 15th St NW)
Sports Bar • $ $ $ $ •
* Tara T. • November 26, 2011If you want sports, burgers, or specials come here. If you want a dive or indie bar go to zeba or raven down the street. I like Lou's a lot.
